pageContext.claim: “All across America, hardworking taxpayers balance their household budgets, find ways to do more with less, and still manage to save for the future. Washington should treat their tax dollars the same way. President Trump's 2020 Budget will do just that.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump tweets a statement about his 2020 budget, suggesting it is balanced like a "household budget." But his budget projects $1 trillion deficits and abandons even the pretense of trying to achieve balance within his presidency. When Trump was running for presidency, he unrealistically claimed that he would not only balance the budget but pay down the national debt within eight years.
